lead_paragraph: After five straight home losses, the Detroit Red Wings knew they badly needed to beat the New York Islanders on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Red Wings Rout Islanders 5-1 for First Home Win of 2016
headline.main: Red Wings Rout Islanders 5-1 for First Home Win of 2016

snippet: After five straight home losses, the Detroit Red Wings knew they badly needed to beat the New York Islanders on Saturday....
